CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, November 14, 1959, pg. 9, reads: "Open - House Guides - Tuesday was open house at the Veterans Administration Hospital, Oakland, and many visitors took advantage of the occasion to visit and inspect this medical sanctuary which does such a fine job of mending the health of those who suffered injuries while serving their country so loyally. The Courier photographer snapped this picture of some of the hospital guides, who conducted the tours for the visitors.  Left to right: Marlene Huber, Linda Gottschalk, Dolores Bartel, Russell Link, chief, Special Services; Antoinette Jones, Audrey Funk and Betty Poerio. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Veteran's Administration Hospital guides, from left: Marlene Huber, Linda Gottschalk, Dolores Bartel, Russell Link, Antoinette Jones, Audrey Funk, and Betty J. Poerio
